description: E2E test scenarios for sprint runner stabilization

scenarios.title: feat: add hover effects to navigation links
scenarios.body:
## Description
The navigation links in the navbar should have hover effects for better UX.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Navigation links change color on hover (e.g., from #ccc to white)
- [ ] Hover transition is smooth (CSS transition, at least 0.2s)
- [ ] Add a test in `tests/` that verifies the nav hover styles exist in `style.css`

## Technical Notes
- Edit `style.css` to add `.nav-links a:hover` rule
- The test should read `style.css` and check for the hover rule

scenarios.title: fix: correct broken privacy policy link in footer
scenarios.body:
## Description
The footer contains a broken link: `htps://cloudpulse.example.com/privacy` — it should be `https://` (missing the second 't' in https).

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Footer link href is `https://cloudpulse.example.com/privacy` (not `htps://`)
- [ ] Add a regression test that reads `index.html` and verifies the link starts with `https://`

## Technical Notes
- Fix the typo in `index.html` footer section
- Test should use fs.readFileSync to read index.html and assert the correct URL

scenarios.title: feat: add pricing tier calculator utility
scenarios.body:
## Description
Add a utility function that determines the pricing tier based on monthly usage.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Create `getPricingTier(monthlyHours: number)` in `src/pricing.ts`
- [ ] Returns `'starter'` for 0-100 hours, `'pro'` for 101-500 hours, `'enterprise'` for 500+ hours
- [ ] Throws error for negative hours
- [ ] Add at least 4 tests covering all tiers and the error case

## Technical Notes
- New file `src/pricing.ts`
- Tests in `tests/pricing.test.ts`

scenarios.title: feat: add CSS custom properties for dark mode
scenarios.body:
## Description
Add CSS custom properties (variables) to support a future dark mode toggle.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add `:root` CSS variables for colors: `--bg-primary`, `--bg-secondary`, `--text-primary`, `--text-secondary`, `--accent`
- [ ] Add `[data-theme='dark']` selector that overrides these variables with dark colors
- [ ] Existing styles use the CSS variables instead of hardcoded colors (at minimum: body background, body color, navbar background)
- [ ] Add a test that reads `style.css` and verifies the CSS variables exist

## Technical Notes
- Edit `style.css`
- This is a prerequisite for the dark mode toggle feature

scenarios.title: feat: add testimonials section with customer quotes
scenarios.body:
## Description
Add a testimonials section to the landing page between features and footer.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add a `<section id='testimonials'>` to `index.html` after the features section
- [ ] Include at least 3 testimonial cards with name, role, company, and quote
- [ ] Add CSS styles for the testimonials grid (responsive, 1 column on mobile, 3 on desktop)
- [ ] Export a `getTestimonials()` function from `src/testimonials.ts` that returns the testimonial data as an array
- [ ] Add tests for `getTestimonials()` verifying it returns at least 3 items with required fields

## Technical Notes
- New file `src/testimonials.ts`
- Tests in `tests/testimonials.test.ts`
- Add styles to `style.css`
